section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EDIFICE is a forum to develop and agree guidelines and recommendations on the implementation of e-business standards. The forum was formed in 1986 around the implementation of the EDI standard EDIFACT. Over the years the scope has extended to the latest technologies for inter-enterprise e-business that became available with the wide adoption of the Internet.
relevant_communication:
-Workshops, Webinars, Member Meetings 
-Website with industry guidelines based on international and European standards (ISO, IEC, CEN, ETSI) 
-Sponsorship and participation in conferences and peer-industry events (Automotive, Retail, ...)
